document.full_text: a threat by greece to jettison the euro is long overdue. it might cost the greek economy in the short term, but not as much as the years of recession, stagnation and high unemployment.
document.title: op-ed contributor: why greece should reject the euro
lines_and_colors: a threat by greece to jettison the euro is long overdue. it might cost the greek economy in the short term, but not as much as the years of recession, stagnation and high unemployment.
